parameters.description: Id of adaptor containing object to update.
parameters.name: adaptorId

parameters.description: Id of adaptive object type of object to update.
parameters.name: objectType

parameters.description: Object containing properties to replace in existing object. You can use object_modify instead to update properties of embedded objects and arrays, as well as to modify individual values of the object.
parameters.name: object

parameters.description: The properties of this object will be added to the associated journal entry. Refer to /afw/_AdaptiveObjectType_/_AdaptiveJournalEntry_ for property names to avoid and for ones that have specific semantics.
parameters.name: journal

parameters.description:
This is an optional object parameter with an objectType determined by the adaptorType associated with the adaptorId parameter. If the adaptorType supports this parameter, adaptor afw will have an adaptive object type with an id of:

_AdaptiveAdaptorTypeSpecific_${adaptorType}_modify_object

Where ${adaptorType} is the adaptor type id.
parameters.name: adaptorTypeSpecific
